description.displayText: Elizabeth is the absolute best! We are moving away and wish we could bring Elizabeth with us! Punctual, kind, organized, creative and easy to work with just to name a few, the list goes on. Our daughter loves her and so do we!
description.originalText: Elizabeth is the absolute best! We are moving away and wish we could bring Elizabeth with us! Punctual, kind, organized, creative and easy to work with just to name a few, the list goes on. Our daughter loves her and so do we!

description.displayText: We love Elizabeth (& so do our kids)! She started working with our family because we needed someone to cover for us on sporadic work days as well the occasional school drop off/pick up & it was an easy transition for everyone. She is a sport with the online learning, which can be challenging with two kids but managed to get both kids through their complete day(s) of learning.  On a side note, our dog loves her too! She always comes with a treat (or several) for her as well.   We are glad to have Elizabeth in our lives.

description.displayText: Elizabeth has been babysitting our elementary school age daughters for over 2 years now and I can always count on Elizabeth! She's highly reliable, always communicative and responsive, and very helpful! Our girls are always excited to spend time with Elizabeth, and they would gladly have my husband and I out of the door the instant Elizabeth arrives. She's been there for my family on several occasions and I would not consider any other sitter apart from Elizabeth. A big plus too, she's great with our dogs as well! Our dogs are just as thrilled to see her every time.
